recordTypes.name: Planning Application
recordTypes.description: Apply for all Planning permits here.

recordTypes.name: Solar Permit
recordTypes.description: Solar permits for commercial, ground mount system, solar integrated roofs, homeowner projects without the use of a contractor, systems exceeding 38.4 kilowatts, energy storage system only projects, or any other solar system project that does not meet the SolarApp+ Requirements.

recordTypes.name: Re-Roofing - Express Permit
recordTypes.description: Express permits for all re-roof projects.

recordTypes.name: Residential Building Permit
recordTypes.description:
Use this permit for all Residential Permits, including but not limited to New Construction and Additions of Single Family Dwellings, Manufactured Homes, ADU’s, JADU’s Duplexes, Townhouses three stories or less. Converting Structures to Habitable Space and other Accessory Structures related to residential properties.
Sheds, Metal Buildings and Garages need to be applied for under Accessory Structure permit unless you are combining the permit with a Residential House or Manufactured Home permit.

recordTypes.name: Code Complaint Form
recordTypes.description: Encountering a problem or facing a potential code enforcement matter within the unincorporated areas of the County? Utilize our user-friendly online platform to submit a request for Code Enforcement staff to investigate. Code Enforcement staff thoroughly investigates all submissions, prioritizing them based on the severity of health and safety risks.

recordTypes.name: Alteration - Residential and Commercial Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this permit for all Residential and Commercial Alterations for Siding, Windows, Home Hardening, Exclusive Remodels, Deck Repairs (not deck replacements), Foundation Installations , Retrofit Foundations (433A), Kitchen and Bathroom Remodels.

recordTypes.name: Electrical - Express Permit
recordTypes.description: Residential only Express Permit for Electrical main service replacement (200 amp max), sub-panel replacement, or whole home rewire.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing - Express Permit
recordTypes.description: Residential and Commercial Express permits for plumbing repairs, fire sprinkler systems and water heater installations/replacements.

recordTypes.name: Commercial Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Use this permit for all Commercial and Multi-Family Structures, including but not limited to, cannabis facilities temporary shipping containers, greenhouses, businesses, offices and cell towers (and cell tower modifications).

recordTypes.name: Accessory Structure Permit
recordTypes.description: Permits are required for construction of uninhabitable accessory structures including but not limited to accessory storage units (over 120 square feet), awnings, carports, decks, equipment buildings, outdoor kitchens, greenhouses (not for cannabis), patio covers, pool cabanas, retaining walls, storage sheds (over 120 square feet), storage tanks, swim spas, swimming pools and spas, portable spas, swimming pool repairs, docks.

recordTypes.name: Demolition Permit
recordTypes.description: Building permits for the demolition of a building, structure or portion of a structure, including pools.

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: Electrical permits for stand alone electrical work including but not limited to relocations, outlets, lighting, receptacles, new home runs (circuits), switches, fire alarm systems, smoke alarm systems, security alarm systems, electric services (over 200amps) and EV charging stations.

recordTypes.name: Generator Permit
recordTypes.description: Mechanical permits for stand-alone mechanical work including but not limited to relocations and new installations. Minor electrical and plumbing work supporting the equipment only is permitted and will be reviewed on a case-by-case basis.

recordTypes.name: Mechanical - Express Permit
recordTypes.description: Express permits for HVAC, Mini-Splits, Fireplaces, Water Heaters, Furnaces and Wall Heaters.

recordTypes.name: Mechanical Permit
recordTypes.description: Mechanical permits for Commercial Vent Hoods and Residential Gas and Electric Vent Hoods with and without Stoves and Propone Tanks.

recordTypes.name: SolarAPP+ Solar Permit
recordTypes.description: Expedited solar permitting for residential installations is available through the SolarAPP+ program. A SolarAPP+ Approval Document is required in order to obtain a permit of this type. If you don't hold one already, you can learn how to get one at solarapp.nrel.gov
